name: X Marks the Spot
description:
X marks the spot is a small puzzle game based on the weekly hour game jam theme: A Pirate I Was Meant To Be.

What's a pirate's fourth favourite thing to do? That's right, find buried treasure! Unfortunately, these pirates have forgotten their treasure. With three attempts, can you work out where the treasure is buried? And can you find the sure-fire way to find the treasure every time?
